cards.title: 简介
cards.body: 这份 [PHP](https://www.php.net/manual/zh/index.php) 备忘单为快速查找最常用代码的正确语法提供了参考

cards.title: hello.php
cards.code:
<?php // 以 PHP 开放标签开头
echo "Hello World\n";
print("Hello jaywcjlove.github.io");
?>

cards.title: hello.php
cards.code: $ php hello.php

cards.title: 变量 Variables
字符串 Strings
数组 Arrays
运算符 Operators
Include
cards.code:
<?php // 以 PHP 开放标签开头。
$fruit = 'apple';
echo "I was imported";
return 'Anything you like.';
?>

cards.title: Include
cards.code:
<?php
include 'vars.php';
echo $fruit . "\n";   # => apple
/* 与 include 相同，
如果不能包含则导致错误*/
require 'vars.php';
// 也有效
include('vars.php');
require('vars.php');
// 通过 HTTP 包含
include 'http://x.com/file.php';
// 包含和返回语句
$result = include 'vars.php';
echo $result;  # => Anything you like.
?>

cards.title: Null
可迭代对象 Iterables
字符串 String
多行 Multi-line
操作 Manipulation
cards.code:
$s = "Hello Phper";
echo strlen($s);       # => 11
echo substr($s, 0, 3); # => Hel
echo substr($s, 1);    # => ello Phper
echo substr($s, -4, 3);# => hpe
echo strtoupper($s);   # => HELLO PHPER
echo strtolower($s);   # => hello phper
echo strpos($s, "l");      # => 2
var_dump(strpos($s, "L")); # => false

cards.body: #### 混合 int 和 string 键

cards.title: 定义
定义
多阵列
cards.code:
$multiArray = [ 
    [1, 2, 3],
    [4, 5, 6],
    [7, 8, 9],
];
print_r($multiArray[0][0]) # => 1
print_r($multiArray[0][1]) # => 2
print_r($multiArray[0][2]) # => 3

cards.title: 多类型
操作
cards.code:
$arr = array(5 => 1, 12 => 2);
$arr[] = 56;      // 附加
$arr["x"] = 42;   // 用键添加
sort($arr);       // 排序
unset($arr[5]);   // 消除
unset($arr);      // 移除所有

cards.title: 索引迭代
价值迭代
关键迭代
Into 函数
Splat运算符
算术
cards.code:
// 算术
$sum        = 1 + 1; // 2
$difference = 2 - 1; // 1
$product    = 2 * 2; // 4
$quotient   = 2 / 1; // 2
// 速记算术
$num = 0;
$num += 1;       // 将 $num 增加 1
echo $num++;     // 打印 1（评估后的增量）
echo ++$num;     // 打印 3（评估前的增量）
$num /= $float;  // 将商除并分配给 $num

### fopen() 模式

:- | -
:- | -
`r`  | 读
`r+` | 读写，前置
`w`  | 写入，截断
`w+` | 读写，截断
`a`  | 写，追加
`a+` | 读写，追加
